doc.field: Arbitration cases. "How One Company Prepares For Collective Bargaining: A Step- by Step Guide." Resumes. Course materials. Clippings on labor issues. Martin Luther King, Jr. Scholarship Fund applications. University of Florence materials (c. 1945). Student Work. NYS Board of Mediation strike reports. National Academy of Arbitrators materials.
